items.sentence: Tom will likely be the first one to get here today.
Tom will likely be unable to resist the temptation.
Tom is afraid that someone will see him doing that.
Did you know we were supposed to do that yesterday?
Did you know that I used to teach French in Boston?
My father wants me to study abroad while I'm young.
Do you want to be the one who does the negotiating?
We weren't sure if Tom wanted to go with us or not.
Tom was the only one doing what Mary told us to do.
You're just looking for a pretext to get rid of me.
